document.full_text: russia's central bank surprised markets by raising its deposit rate on monday, citing inflation expectations and risks to economic growth, and indicated that current rates will "be acceptable" in coming months.
document.title: russia central bank hikes deposit rate, hints will pause
lines_and_colors: russia's central bank surprised markets by raising its deposit rate on monday, citing inflation expectations and risks to economic growth, and indicated that current rates will "be acceptable" in coming months.
